Trade/Device Name(s): APAS Independence with Urine Analysis Module
Regulation Name(s): Automated Image Assessment System For Microbial Colonies On Solid Culture Media
Analyte(s): Microbial growth on urine culture plates (sheep blood agar, MacConkey agar)
Methodologies: Automated imaging and interpretation of microbial colonies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for APAS Independence with Urine Analysis Module automating urine culture plate imaging and interpretation to aid UTI diagnosis
Indications for Use Summary: Automates urine culture plate imaging and interpretation to detect microbial growth on blood and MacConkey agar plates inoculated with urine for semi-quantitative colony count assessment as an aid in diagnosing urinary tract infection; positive plates require microbiologist review
